concept.title: BIMPROPAGATEFROMFILE Command
concept.shortdesc: Opens the Select Source File Dialog Box.

conbody.p: Open the to select a dwg file to propagate in the current drawing.

After selecting the file and choosing Open, you are prompted at the Command line. The prompt sequence depends on the type of detail you selected: Planar, Linear, Pattern, Edge or Corner. For more information see the relevant BIMPROPAGATE commands.
